traits.name: Fall to Shambles
traits.description: When slain, leaves an extra corpse token in an adjacent space (two corpses total)

abilities.name: Unstable Mutation
abilities.description: Effect: Gain 1 strength, (4+) 1 speed, (5+) and 1 vitality, (6+) and explode for splash (self): 1 damage. Spare parts: Roll +1D per corpse and pick the highest result.

upgrades.name: Genestealer
upgrades.description: Twisting strike gains Effect (5+): steal a positive token from target.

upgrades.name: Spread Mutate
upgrades.description: Twisting strike also causes an adjacent ally to mutate.

upgrades.name: Warping Mutate
upgrades.description: May step 1 (4+) or 3 spaces before Unstable mutation

traits.name: Lope
traits.description: Has free movement and ignores hazards in spaces occupied by corpses.

abilities.name: Bloodgorger
abilities.description: Effect: Mutate, then gain 1 strength. Spare Parts: Then gain (3+) 1 speed, (5+) and 1 vitality, (6+) then mutate again. Roll 1D per corpse consumed for the effect.

abilities.name: Bloody Slashes
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage. Effect: splash (self): 1 damage.

upgrades.name: The Hunger
upgrades.description: If starting turn in range 2 of a corpse, may step 2

upgrades.name: Autophagia
upgrades.description: At turn start, may deal 1 damage to self, ignoring armor, to generate a corpse in an adjacent space

upgrades.name: Hunch
upgrades.description: May use corpses as cover spaces

traits.name: Leftovers
traits.description: Has a 4+ effect chance after MOVEing to drop a corpse in a free adjacent space

abilities.name: Inject Mutagen
abilities.description: Effect: One or two units in range mutate. Spare parts: and also dole out 1 strength per corpse consumed.

abilities.name: Purge
abilities.description: Effect: A unit in range removes one token of this unitâ€™s choice (3+): two (5+) all

abilities.name: Marriage
abilities.description: Effect: Instantly slay self or an allied unit in range. Another allied unit in range gains 2 speed, vitality, and strength, or just 1 if the slain unit was a thrall.

upgrades.name: Absorb
upgrades.description: May grant one of the tokens stolen by Purge to another unit in range

upgrades.name: Scour Flesh
upgrades.description: Purge deals 1 toxic damage to foes

upgrades.name: Conjoin
upgrades.description: IF targeting self, Marriage also clears all negative tokens on target first

traits.name: Flight
traits.description: Ignores adverse terrain and elevation attack and movement penalties

abilities.name: Regurgitate
abilities.description: Effect: Splash (target): Create a corpse in the area for every unit in the area, up to three times, then mutate.

abilities.name: Sin Eater
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage. Effect: Steal a positive token from target. Spare Parts: plus one more token per corpse consumed. If target has no positive tokens, gain 1 strength instead of stealing a token

upgrades.name: Drown in Viscera
upgrades.description: Regurgitate has a 5+ effect chance to strip a token of your choice from each foe in the area.

upgrades.name: Rapid Adaptation
upgrades.description: May mutate once for each corpse created with Regurgitate instead.

upgrades.name: Cleansing Wash
upgrades.description: Regurgitate has a 5+ effect chance to remove a negative token from an ally caught in the area

abilities.name: Sculpt Flesh
abilities.description: Effect: Gain 1 strength, OR 1 speed, OR 1 vitality. Spare parts: Repeat this effect once for each corpse consumed.

abilities.name: Absorb
abilities.description: Effect: Deal 1 devil damage to an adjacent unit. If reduce to 0 hp, obliterates unit and the homunculus gains any tokens the absorbed unit had.

abilities.name: Flesh Whip
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage and splash (target): 1 damage and (4+) create one (6+) or two corpse tokens in an adjacent space to target.

upgrades.name: Ball of Limbs
upgrades.description: When choosing to MOVE again, destroys walls and absorbs corpses it moves over, mutating each time

upgrades.name: Meld
upgrades.description: When absorbing allies, slays instead of obliterating them, and this unit mutates.

upgrades.name: Form Carapace
upgrades.description: If absorb destroys a unit, gains physical armor for the rest of combat.

traits.name: Polyglot
traits.description: At turn start, may convert one of this unit's mutation tokens into strength, speed, or vitality. Then, mutate.

abilities.name: Experimental Surgery
abilities.description: Line: 1 damage. Effect: Allies in the line mutate instead of taking damage.

soulAbilities.name: Wild Mutation
soulAbilities.description: Trigger: Turn start. Effect: Unit gains 1 strength, (3-4) OR 1 speed, (5-6) OR 1 vitality. Spare Parts: May choose one token per corpse consumed instead of rolling.

soulAbilities.name: Sample Genome
soulAbilities.description: Copy all positive tokens on target unit, then grant them to another unit in range.

upgrade.name: Accelerate Evolution
upgrade.description: At turn end, may remove one token from this unit and grant to a unit in range 2.

upgrade.name: Rapid Move
upgrade.description: May remove a mutation token at start of end of own turn to step 2.

upgrade.name: Ancillary Limbs
upgrade.description: May remove a mutation token on self to grant +1D on any attack and allow it to ignore cover.

upgrade.name: New Material
upgrade.description: Create one, (3+) two, (5+) three corpses in free adjacent spaces, then mutate once for each corpse created.

upgrade.name: Clone
upgrade.description: Create a perfect copy of an allied unit in range in any other free space in range. Then obliterate the original as it collapses into flesh and replace it with a corpse token.

upgrade.name: Stitch Fix
upgrade.description: Effect: Remove up to three negative tokens from a unit, then it may step 1 and it mutates. Spare Parts: The unit mutates and steps once for each negative token removed instead.

upgrade.name: Inject Stimulant
upgrade.description: Effect: Choose a unit in range. That unit may step 2. If it ends its turn in the space of a corpse, it mutates, removes the corpse, then may repeat this effect.

upgrade.name: Biotoxin Injector
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 toxin damage. Effect: At end of target's next turn, they explode for a splash (target) effect for 1 toxin damage. Your allies in the area mutate instead of taking damage.

upgrade.name: Mutagen Injector
upgrade.description: On hit: May remove one positive token from target, then deal 1 toxin damage. Spare Parts: Repeat this effect once.

upgrade.name: Chaos Beam
upgrade.description: Effect: Line: 1 fire damage and inflict 1 vulnerable, (3-4) OR 1 toxic damage and inflict 1 slow, (5-6) OR 1 curse damage and inflict 1 weak. Spare Parts: Roll 1D for effect per corpse consumed and choose any result.

upgrade.name: Flesh Jump
upgrade.description: Effect: Swap places with an allied unit, then both of you mutate.

upgrade.name: Grow Bonus Legs
upgrade.description: Effect: Remove any number of mutation tokens on self or target unit, then target may step 2 per token removed with free movement, ignoring hazards.

upgrade.name: Grow Bonus Limbs
upgrade.description: Trigger: Turn start. Effect: Remove any number of mutation tokens from target, then target gains +1D on attacks this turn per token removed, and their damage ignores armor.

upgrade.name: Recycle
upgrade.description: Trigger: Turn end. Effect: Deal 1 toxic damage to unit. If this reduces them to 0 hp, they are obliterated. Create up to 3 corpse tokens under their space or in free adjacent spaces.

upgrade.name: Devolve
upgrade.description: Trigger: Turn start. Effect: Inflict 1 slow, weak, and vulnerable on a foe (5+) twice.

upgrade.name: Final Form
upgrade.description: Trigger: Turn start. Effect: Increase MV to 6, DF to 6+, gain 6 strength, become curseproof, gain free movement, and gain super armor. Keep any damage taken. At the end of your next turn, your form destabilizes and you are obliterated.
